name: carshow_management_app
description: Car Show Management App - Vehicle registration, judging, and voting system

_dependencies_info.bad-words-plus: Profanity filter for group chat messages (replaces bad words with f*** style asterisks)
_dependencies_info.bcrypt: Password hashing and verification for user authentication
_dependencies_info.cookie-session: Session management via signed cookies (login state)
_dependencies_info.express: Web server framework for routing and HTTP handling
_dependencies_info.morgan: HTTP request logging middleware for debugging
_dependencies_info.multer: File upload handling for profile photos and vehicle images
_dependencies_info.sharp: Image resizing and optimization for uploaded photos
_dependencies_info.socket.io: WebSocket library for real-time notifications, live status updates, and future chat
_dependencies_info.sqlite3: Embedded SQL database for storing users, vehicles, scores, and votes
